meanings.definition: An exclamation of surprise or indignation.
meanings.sent1: Zounds! I can't believe my eyes!
meanings.sent3: Zounds! Did you see that rabbit wearing sunglasses?
meanings.sent4: Zounds! The news hit me like a lightning bolt.
meanings.sent5: Zounds! The sudden thunder made me jump.

meanings.definition: Used to express annoyance or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Oh, zounds! I forgot my keys again.
meanings.sent3: Zounds! My sandwich fell face down on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Zounds! The constant noise grated on my nerves like sandpaper.
meanings.sent5: Zounds! The never-ending queue tested my patience to the limit.
